The term Peak Oil is one that most investors are now aware of. Yet the meaning of peak oil is widely misunderstood. Peak Oil does not mean that the world is nearing a time where there is no oil available. Rather it refers to the rapidly developing situation in the production of oil where the major oil fields of the world are in a state of production decline and even with new technology no major easy to access oil fields have been recently discovered.
